channel.title: [Delta] Seldom-Pkz - Started from DeltaClean
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i54.tinypic.com/1z6dzpu.png[/img] Base: [B]My optimized Delta[/b] This server was based off of a DeltaClean, cleaned up by myself. I've released my DeltaClean base already. [b]Why choose Delta?[/b]: I wanted to choose Delta because it's the base I'm most familiar with, and there aren't any tutorials, so I won't be tempted to look at any copy & paste tutorials. [b]Information[/b]: This server will mimic a 420-474-protocol. (still writing info) [b]Things I still want to do (most importantly)[/b]: [ul][li]Have the server run on a single thread, instead of multiple threads per player[/li] [li]Re-Enable RSA & ISAAC Encryption[/li] [li]Handle the packet system through arrays[/li] [li]Handle NPC's (drops, combat, emotes) alternatively instead of in a config file[/li][/ul] [b]Update Log started from 6/01/11:[/b]
From oldest to newest [ol]Started project Finished headicon configuration and walking packets Finished emotes Started seperating packets Finished prayer with accurate bonuses and switching Lowered gameframe to 377 protocol Finished skillcape emotes Updated gameframe to 420 Started removing combat Finished combat calculations Finished Item wielding (modified calc's as well) Finished weapon timers (handled through switch) Started working on server content Started Fight pits Started Fight caves Finished NPC spawns for Tzhaar caves Finished Fight pits Started Barrows Finished seperating packets Finished fight caves Edited Dialogues and rewards for fight caves Edited starter Started pest control Added newer interfaces to client Edited starter moar :D Finished Pest Control **** REVISE ***** Started skills Finished stall->empty stall thievin finished runerafting finished woodcutting -dont add stumps finished mining edited xp rates for mining and woodcutting **** REVISE **** Added curses **** REVISE ***** Added KBD and KQ Started/revising npc drops started bank investing finished BI modify dialogues for BI add combat pvp added t-scheduling... **** REVISE **** finished thread-scheduling removed process.java started removal of t-p-c... readded t-p-c added weapon specials edited godsword effects and curses started godwars finally finished godwars bosses + minions anims and effects finished gs dismantling finished godwars finished fletching finished cooking added blackmark system finished herblore **** REVISE **** finished potions finished overloads added buy and sell x added barrelchest boss and anchor rewrote special bar handling
Media: (This also includes current features) [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/33vg6t0.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/302mowh.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/6yf8tc.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/1hcx86.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2v26wjp.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/jj65ty.gif[/img] [IMG]http://img828.imageshack.us/img828/2658/45060422.png[/img] [IMG]http://img6.imageshack.us/img6/6696/94368489.png[/img] [IMG]http://img812.imageshack.us/img812/2249/64494904.png[/img] [IMG]http://img199.imageshack.us/img199/7474/43010684.png[/img] [IMG]http://img231.imageshack.us/img231/9034/86672812.png[/img] [IMG]http://img42.imageshack.us/img42/3622/56934587.png[/img] [IMG]http://img838.imageshack.us/img838/6559/camelot.png[/img] [IMG]http://img27.imageshack.us/img27/4781/cookt.png[/img] [IMG]http://img89.imageshack.us/img89/4428/81388823.png[/img] [IMG]http://img36.imageshack.us/img36/5339/fightpits.png[/img] [IMG]http://img35.imageshack.us/img35/8439/17010519.png[/img] [IMG]http://img683.imageshack.us/img683/6100/invk.png[/img] [IMG]http://img39.imageshack.us/img39/6007/12343299.png[/img] [IMG]http://img402.imageshack.us/img402/747/11032514.png[/img] [IMG]http://img9.imageshack.us/img9/1374/rangem.png[/img] [IMG]http://img813.imageshack.us/img813/8104/votez.png[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2ur2e0i.png[/img] [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/mhaofc.png[/img] [img]http://seldom-pkz.net/seldom/capture-4.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2cdb989.png[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/jgth5z.png[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/296g191.png[/img] Bank investing: [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/33wp28l.gif[/img] [b]How it works[/b]: A user talks to a banker and pays him an amount of money. Once the investment is set, everytime a player plays twenty minutes, he/she logs back in, and he [b]may or may not[/b] receive cash back. You can invest more than 20k, thus receiving more money. If a user has a full inventory, he/she has to talk a banker to receive their payment.[/ol]

item.title: [Delta] Seldom-Pkz - Started from DeltaClean
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“kingdomkey01, post:47, topic:402570”][quote author=The Wanderer link=topic=499627.msg3672467#msg3672467 date=1311026634]

NPC spawns are now loaded through an xml instead of a config, I find it easier to edit XML, I don’t have to follow the ridiculous format of tabs and spaces.

XML loads terribly slow though…
[/quote]

My server already takes a bit to start up because of some instancing, :D, but yes, xml does take some time to load, I might rethink of another way to load spawns, since config is not my favorite.

What client are you using? If you could, could you post a link? Thanks.

This client was actually from an old DeltaScape v16 client years ago, :p.[/quote]

Yeah, I have that one. I switched over to Galkons Refractored 317 deob base.

Could you read my pm?

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Seldom-Pkz - Started from DeltaClean
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

The Wanderer:

Amount of memory and cpu usage. How everything is structured. I’m not really someone you should ask on that topic haha. I know, though, that deltas back in the day used to only host about 40 people online on a home pc without lagging. So you’ve made, at the least, a 2.5x improvement. What I would do is just keep improving how everything functions. How the packets are sent, would probably be a great improvement since that happens regularly.

Improve player updating. That’s all you need to do. The rest is all pure choice.

Read full topic
